name: Super Awesome Party!
description:
Welcome to the Awesome Party!
I am Prime_Cocoa and I am happy you are giving this game a try
This series of minigames are a small part of my Main game called Super Awesome Princess.
Awesome Party was Originally created and uploaded to Scirra's Arcade, but now I have decided to polish it more and place it in Itch as my first game, because you already know what they say "you have to start small"
I hope you enjoy it and if you have suggestions for new minigames I would love to hear them to implement them in Awesome Princess.
Maybe you would like the game to have local multiplayer or some support for controls and I can gladly implement a local multiplayer if you need it.
